text:
The Chief of the @ClarkCountyFD updated local #COVID19 #Vaccine Operations today. John Steinbeck's message - CCFD and @NVNationalGuard can pick up the pace if they can get more doses. He thinks 100,000 #Vaccinations a week is possible - the issue is supply.

#Vegas #Coronavirus https://t.co/XUmPmYaG4R
